stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Potent Remedy for Liver Ailments!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a powerful new potion, a blend of two ancient elixirs. This potent draught can mend damaged vital organs, preventing the decay that plagues many. It sharply reduces scarring and restores health, succeeding where other remedies have faltered.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Caravan Replenishes Magical War Wagons!
stories.fantasy_story: The Evotrex Clan has crafted a marvelous new enchanted caravan. This mystical vehicle can imbue your great war wagon with arcane energy after a long journey. Many adventurers worried about their magical chariots losing power while pulling heavy loads, but this new invention solves that plight.
